app.title: TB&Me
app.description: App-ka loogu talagalay in la xakameeyo daawooyinka tuberculosis

links.title: Xiriirinta Ku Saabsan
links.error: Ma awoodo inuu furan karo xiriirka

understanding.title: Fahamka tuberculosis
understanding.subtitle: Cudurrada faafa ah ee loo baahan yahay in la xakameeyo
understanding.what_is_content: Tuberculosis waa cudur ka timid bacteria-ka loo yaqaan Mycobacterium tuberculosis, kadib markii uu ka soo noqdo heerka latent, waxa uu noqonayaa active. Noocan active ee cudurka waxa uu ku saabsan yahay in bacteria-ku u dhaafay. Waxa uu la mid yahay astaamaha iyo waxa uu u baahan yahay daawooyin aad u dheer oo loo yaqaan antibiotics-ka gaarka ah.
understanding.transcription_content: Tuberculosis waxa uu u dhaqaa heerka heerka ee qofka uu ku jiro buuraha markii uu qasbo, cusboonaamiyo ama hadal. Dhaqanka waxa uu u baahan yahay in la xiriiro dhererka u dhow iyo qofka uu ku jiro tuberculosis-ka buuraha ee u dhaqaa.

itl.title: Faafa Tuberculosis Infection (FTI)
itl.what_is_content: Faafa tuberculosis infection, bacteria-ka waxa uu la nugul yahay, la xidhiidha dhamaanteeda badan ee jismiga. Bacteria-gan waxa uu ku noqon karaa 'dhulul'. Qofka waxa uu kama qaadan karo inuu cudurka uu ku dhaco hayaatada.
itl.itl_char_5: 3 bilood daawooyin ka hor inta cudurka
itl.active_char_5: 6 bilood ama inta badan daawooyin daawooyin

symptoms.title: Astaamaha iyo daawooyinka
symptoms.symptom_5: Meel aan la rabin meel kasta
symptoms.treatment_content: Daawooyinka waxay u baahan tahay in la qaato daawooyin badan maalin kasta, bilood badan. Waxay u baahan tahay in la qaato halka ay jirto. Si caadi ahaan, waxay u baahan tahay in la qaato 30 daqiiqo ka hor inta cunto la qaadanayo.
symptoms.important_note: Waa muhiim in aan daawooyinka joojin, illaa cudurka waxa uu noqon karaa inuu mar kale soo noqdaa.

prevention.title: Ka hor inta cudurka
prevention.vaccination_content: Vaccination BCG waxa uu sii jiraa in la talin karo, gaar ahaan carruurta ka yar 5 sano ee leh xaalado loo baahan yahay in la xakameeyo.
prevention.screening_content: Iskaashiga tuberculosis waxay leeyihiin doorka muhiimka ah ee ka hor inta cudurka oo ay sameeyaan baarista iyo xakameynta xaaladaha cudurka.

faq.title: Su'aalo badan la weydiiyo
faq.a1: Maya, tuberculosis-ka buuraha kalena waxa uu u dhaqaa. Markii uu ku saabsan yahay qeybaha kale ee jismiga, ma u dhaqaa.
faq.a2: Daawooyinka waxay u dhaan tahay 6 bilood, marar badan oo aad u badan xaaladda. Waa muhiim in la raaco dhammaan.
faq.a3: Haa, tuberculosis-ku waxa uu aad u iibsan karaa maanta Faransiiska haddii daawooyinka la raaco si sax ah.
faq.q4: Yaa u baahan in la xakameeyo?
faq.a4: Xiriirada u dhow iyo dadka uu si aad u la xiriira mararya waxay ku xakameeyaan kooxda iskaashiga tuberculosis.

result.title: Su'aalaha dhamaatay!
result.excellent: Waa fiican! Waxaad ugu fiican tahay mowduuca!
result.good: Waa wanaagsan! Waxaad leh macno wanaagsan.
result.average: Dhexdhexaad ah. Waxaa jira tenaha badan oo aan la eegin.
result.needs_improvement: Waa wanaagsan in aad mar kale akhrido macluumaadka tuberculosis.

q1.question: Waa maxay sababta tuberculosis?
q1.explanation: Tuberculosis waxa uu sababtaa bacteria-ka loo yaqaan Mycobacterium tuberculosis, oo loo yaqaan Koch bacillus.

q2.question: Sidee uu tuberculosis u dhaqaa?
q2.explanation: Tuberculosis waxa uu u dhaqaa heerka heerka markii qofka uu ku jiro cudurka uu qasbo, cusboonaamiyo ama hadal, oo u soo saaraya qotrooyin leh bacteria.

q3.question: Waa maxay noocan tuberculosis ee u dhaqaa?
q3.explanation: Kaliya tuberculosis-ka buuraha waxa uu u dhaqaa sababtoo ah uu ku saabsan yahay buuraha oo u ogolaanaya in uu u dhaqaa heerka heerka.

q4.question: Imisa bilood ah daawooyinka tuberculosis?
q4.explanation: Daawooyinka tuberculosis waxay u dhaan tahay 6 bilood, marar badan oo aad u badan xaaladda. Waa muhiim in la raaco dhammaan.

q5.question: Waa maxay macnaheeda FTI?
q5.explanation: FTI waxay macnaheedaysaa Faafa Tuberculosis Infection. Tani waa markii bacteria-ku uu jiro laakiin 'dhulul', aan jirin astaamaha ama u dhaqaaqa.

q6.question: Goormay daawooyinka tuberculosis la qaadanayo?
q6.a4: Halka ay jirto (ka hor inta cunto)
q6.explanation: Daawooyinka tuberculosis waxay u baahan tahay in la qaato halka ay jirto, ka dib 30 daqiiqo ka hor inta cunto ama 2 saac kadib.

q7.question: Waa maxay astaamaha ugu muhiimsan ee tuberculosis-ka buuraha?
q7.explanation: Astaamaha ugu muhiimsan ee tuberculosis-ka buuraha waa qasbo dherer oo u dhaan 3 usbuuc.

q8.question: Waa maxay dhacaya haddii daawooyinka la joojiyo qaarkood?
q8.a3: Risiko dib u noqoshada iyo ka hor inta daawooyinka
q8.explanation: Daawooyinka joojinta qaarkood waxay keeni kartaa dib u noqoshada cudurka iyo horumarka ka hor inta daawooyinka.

settings.reset_confirmation: Ma hubtaa inaad tirtid dhammaan data-ga?
settings.reset_warning:
Ficilkan waxay tirtirtaa:
• Daawadaada
• Daawooyinka aad qaatay
• Dhammaan dejiyntaada
settings.reset_success: Data-ga waxaa loo tirtiriyaa si wanaagsan
settings.quit_confirmation: Ma hubtaa inaad ka tagto TB&Me?

notifications.fasting_reminder_body: 2 saac kadib, qaado {medication} {dosage}. Hadda wax cuntada ama shidada kama qaadin!
notifications.permissions_help: Waxaad u ogolaan kartaa ogolaanshahanadaas setinka qalabka.
notifications.test_sent_immediately: Test-ka la soo diray si toos ah

permissions.required_message: App-ka waxay u baahan yihiin ogolaanshooyinkan si uu u shaqeeyo si sax ah:

regular_taking: 💊 Qaadashada kasta waxay muhiim tahay! Wanaagsan tahay in aad sii wadid.
🌟 Dhiirigelinadaada waxay ku saabsan tahay. Si wanaagsan sii wad!
🎯 Wanaagsan tahay! Maalin kasta, waxaad ku dhisaysaa caafimaadkaaga.
🌱 Ficil muhiim ah, mustaqbal caafimaad leh. Wanaagsan tahay!
💪 Waxaad ka ilaaliyaa nafkaaga, waxaana la arkaa. Wanaagsan tahay!
🏆 Ficil yar, guul wanaag. Wanaagsan tahay!
✨ Ficil kasta waxay kuu dhiibaysaa caafimaadka. Wanaagsan tahay!
missed_recovery: 🔄 Waxa muhiim ah in aad dib ugu noqotid. Qaadashada kasta waxay muhiim tahay, isagoo laga yaabay in la yaabay!
🤗 Wax walba ma jiro, khalad waa dadka. Ku fiiris maanta!
💚 Laga yaabay waxay dhacdaa. Wanaagsan tahay in aad dib ugu noqotid daawooyinka! Waxaan sii wadaya.
🌈 Waddanka waxay marar badan u baahan yihiin caqabadaha, laakiin aad hadda haysataa! Wanaagsan tahay in aad dib ugu noqotid.
🚀 Ficilkan yaryar waxa uu tahay muujin wanaag oo ku saabsan dhiirigelinadaada. Sii wad!
💪 Waxaan ka tagi karna. Waxa muhiim ah in aad sii wadid. Wanaagsan tahay in aad dib ugu noqotid.
⭐ Ku jira lalanka! Laga yaabay ma awoodi doonto horumarkaaga. Wanaagsan tahay in aad dib ugu noqotid.

catch_up.title: Dib u qaadista daawooyinka
catch_up.fasting_period: Waqti halka ay jirto loo baahan yahay
catch_up.fasting_rules:
2 saacad kadib:
• Wax kama cuntid
• Wax kama shidid
• Wax kama cadid
catch_up.timer_subtitle: Si aad u jirto halka ay jirto
